town_square.title: 🏙️ Town Square
town_square.body: The heart of Arcadia bustles with merchants, exiles, and hidden agents. Lanterns sway overhead, casting golden light on cobblestones polished by centuries of footsteps. A bard’s song drifts from somewhere unseen.

castle_gate.title: 🏰 Castle Gate
castle_gate.body: Tall iron gates loom before you, guarded by armored sentries with cold, watchful eyes. The banners of Arcadia ripple in the wind, their once-bright colors dulled by ash and time.

tavern_inside.title: 🍻 Tavern Interior
tavern_inside.body: The tavern glows with firelight. Tankards slam, dice tumble, and the air is thick with laughter and secrets. In the corner, a bard sings softly of battles long past, while the innkeeper eyes you curiously.

forest_edge.title: 🌲 Forest Edge
forest_edge.body: The woods whisper with unseen eyes. Mist curls between ancient oaks, and every rustle hints at predator or prey. The path ahead narrows, swallowed by shadows.

gossip_corner.title: 👂 Gossip Corner
gossip_corner.body: You lean against a wall near a knot of traders. Their whispers weave tales of smuggling, rebellion, and strange lights beyond the northern hills. The city is alive with rumors.

castle_banner.title: 🏴 Castle Banner
castle_banner.body: The faded cloth is frayed at the edges. Once a proud emblem of Arcadia, it now bears claw marks—deep and deliberate. Something once tried to tear this kingdom’s heart down.

dice_game.title: 🎲 Dice Game
dice_game.body: A group of rough-looking patrons slam dice onto a wooden table. The clatter draws cheers and curses alike. One player waves you over, grinning through broken teeth.

mystic_grove.title: 🌌 Mystic Grove
mystic_grove.body: The forest parts to reveal a clearing bathed in blue light. Crystals jut from the earth, pulsing faintly. A soft hum fills your ears, both comforting and unsettling.
